table.name: access_keys
table.Comment: The table of available access keys to use with the API

table.name: requests
table.Comment: History of all valid requests that were made to the API

column.name: id
column.Comment: The ID of the Access Key

column.name: public_id
column.Comment: The Public ID of the Access Key

column.name: public_key
column.Comment: The Public Key for the Access Key, used for making requests

column.name: state
column.Comment: The state of the access key

column.name: usage_data
column.Comment: Usage data which determines if the Access Key can still be used

column.name: permissions
column.Comment: Permissions data which determines what modules that this access key has access to

column.name: analytics
column.Comment: The Analytical data regarding the usage of this access key for this month and the past month

column.name: signatures
column.Comment: Encryption Signatures for authentication purposes

column.name: id
column.Comment: The ID of the Request

column.name: refrence_id
column.Comment: The public Refrence ID for the Request

column.name: execution_time
column.Comment: The execution time of the request (in microseconds)

column.name: timestamp
column.Comment: The Unix Timestamp that this request was made

column.name: client_ip
column.Comment: The IP Address of the client

column.name: version
column.Comment: The version of the API that was used

column.name: module
column.Comment: The Module of the API that was used for this request

column.name: request_method
column.Comment: The request method that was used

column.name: request_paramerters
column.Comment: The paramerters that was used (JSON Encoded)

column.name: response_type
column.Comment: The response type given from the server

column.name: response_code
column.Comment: The HTTP Response code given by the server

column.name: authentication_method
column.Comment: The authentication method used by the user

column.name: access_key_public_id
column.Comment: The public ID of the access key that was used (From API Key or Certificate)

column.name: fatal_error
column.Comment: Indicates if this request ended in a fatal exception which was handled by the server

column.name: exception_details
column.Comment: The details of the exception if there was a fatal error
